Content: Say for someone my age_ would have more_ *indecent* thoughts about a crush be weird?
It's more of a crush but she sends me weird signals?
Y'know the picture of a thousand traffic lights strung together and they all are different colors?
I'm only asking this because I reached that point after testing where I've counted all the little objects in the room so my mind wonders.
It picked her as the topic and started moving blood.
I had to scream internally at mhself for it.
